feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Added Elestio as one-click deploy option by @kaiwalyakoparkar in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9921
  • Sort filters for expense.payment_date by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9942
  • Rotessa: New payment flow by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9945
  • Minor fixes. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9948
  • Add reversal for failed BTC payments by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9960
  • Updates for template service properties
  • Fixes for confirming gateway fees
  • Set blank string for signature date
  • Remove paypal express, omnipay
  • v5.10.27 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9969

New Contributors

  • @kaiwalyakoparkar made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9921

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.26...v5.10.27

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.28
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes when previewing purchase order designs from invoice design view
  • Customization of Payment Failed Email Template
  • Fixes for GoCardless Instant Bank Payment
  • Updates for Forte CSG
  • E-Invoice: Payment means code can only contain credit transfer codes by @arnebr in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9988
  • New payment flow @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9994
  • Feature: inbound email expenses & mindee ocr by @paulwer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9042
  • CBA Powerboard Payment Driver by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10001
  • Blockonomics BTC Payment Driver in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10012

New Contributors

  • @arnebr made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9988

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.27...v5.10.28

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.29
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • WebSockets: Add broadcast events by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10005
  • Add vi lang by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10027
  • New payment flow: PDF on the show page by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10035
  • GoCardless: OAuth by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9584
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10041
  • GoCardless: Force sandbox for specific company by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10042
  • Fixes for Rotessa by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10045
  • Fixes for product sales export by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10052
  • GoCardless OAuth2: MultiDB by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10057
  • Fixes for Dependabot config by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10056
  • Fixes for template action regression by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10062
  • Fixes for validation of company import when migrating by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10064
  • InvoiceWasPaid: Don't broadcast to current user by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10051
  • v5.10.30 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10076

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.29...v5.10.30

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.31
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • v5.10.31 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10080
  • Merge Vendors
  • Add tests for bulk updates for expenses
  • Add Bulk Updates
  • Roll back schema
  • Disable the scout driver
  • minor fixes for Mollie
  • Fixes for BTC Pay
  • Fixes for tax summary
  • Parse floats to user formatted versions in exports
  • Fixes for export formats
  • Parse floats to user formatted versions in exports
  • Improve parsing of floats for Imports

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.30...v5.10.31
